nodes.text: The Kilandran Royal Forces was a military order that operated during the time of the Galactic Republic. In about 700 BBY, it merged with a number of other military orders, to form the Iotran Police Force, a military force that was based on Iotra. Following the merger, the Royal Forces continued to exist within the Police Force, as an organizational unit.

Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies establishes the name of the organization as the "Kinlandrin Royal Forces." the later source, Pirates & Privateers, spells the group's name as the Kilandran Royal Forces. This article assumes that Privates & Privateers is correct as the most recently published source.
